DOC.brief_summary: The objective Symbiot III Clinical Trial evaluate safety effectiveness Symbiot Covered Stent System treatment symptomatic ischemic saphenous vein bypass graft disease .
DOC.brief_title: Symbiot III : A Prospective Randomized Trial Evaluating Symbiot Covered Stent System Saphenous Vein Grafts
DOC.detailed_description: Symbiot III prospective , multi-center , randomize , control trial evaluate safety efficacy Symbiot stent compare bare metal stent treatment symptomatic ischemic saphenous vein graft disease . Randomization stratify intend use intravenous glycoprotein IIb/IIIa inhibitor intend use approve distal protection ensure approximate balance study treatment within stratum . The primary outcome variable study target lesion percent diameter stenosis 8 month post-implant .

Patient child bear potential negative pregnancy test within 7 day prior treatment Angiographic 1 . Target lesion ( ) locate within single SVG 2 . Reference vessel > =3.5 mm < =5.5mm diameter stent deployment site 3 . Cumulative target lesion length < =41mm 4 . Target lesion ( ) randomize treatment study device must completely cover 1 2 stent ( maximum allowable aggregate stent length target vessel 51 mm ) 5 . Target lesion stenosis > =50 % < 100 % General 1 . Patient currently enrol another IRBapproved trial reach primary endpoint visit still active treatment phase 2 . Patient previously enrol Symbiot Trial 3 . Patient document leave ventricular ejection fraction < 30 % within 30 day enrollment 4 . Patient myocardial infarction within 48 hour prior trial procedure and/or CKMB > 2X ULN 5 .
